text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Eligible child" means an individual with developmental disability under the age of 22 years who is:
In an out-of-home placement; or
At immediate risk of out-of-home placement.

section.section: "Family" means an eligible child's natural, adoptive, or foster parents.

"Family" includes:
A guardian;
A person acting as a parent of a child; or
A relative or stepparent with whom a child lives.
"Family support services" means a program designed to enable a family to provide for the needs of a child with developmental disability living in the home.

text.section: "Program" means the Family Support Services Program.
